title: Problems viewing Match History.
body: Ok, so I keep trying to view the match history on the website, but when I go to the page nothing shows up, even when I click FAQ. It was fine when I first got online and to the website, but when I tried after playing a few matches nothing showed up. Am I the only one having this problem? Anyone know what I might be able to do to fix this? I've attached a screenshot of what I get when I open the page for reference.

replies.body:
Hello Forest Gem!

Usually this error occurs when a player changes the language settings on their client.  Did you make any changes to your Client so that the client and the game will use a different language or voices other than English (such as Korean)?
I have made no changes to the client that would change the language. It has nothing to do with the client, it is the website. I am not the only one having this problem.

It is true that you are not the only one having this problem.  However, the most common reason we see this issue is due to the fact that players have changed the locale files on their client.  If you go to the advanced match history from your client to the webpage, the URL link will break and not properly appear.

The other common root cause for this issue are issues with the cookies/cache of your web browser.  I recommend that you try clearing out your cookies and cache by following this guide:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28756024-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies

If this still doesn't affect the page from loading at all, could you try loading this page in a different web browser?  It would help us greatly in eliminating your browser itself as a possible root cause.

Happening for me too. Cleared all cache and cookies from beginning of time and even tried in IE with the same [result](http://gyazo.com/951d9197f2727fcb54b9aa35bf29c864)

Not a big deal just a minor inconvenience if I want to view specifics about a match

When you say that nothing is showing up, is the page just blank or is there any errors that you see? Can you take a screenshot? 

What browser are you using? Have you tried using a different once to see what happens? And have you tried emptying the cache?

There are no errors that show up. The header-thing and the background load, as well as the footer stuff but nothing else. I'll try uploading a screenshot of it. I'm using Chrome, btw. I am *not* going to see if it works on Internet Explorer.

Is there a reason why you don't want to try it in Internet Explorer? It can be really valuable information to know if it works in one browser and not the other, as you can narrow down what the problem might be. Try it in "incognito mode" in Chrome (ctrl+shift+N), and see if you get the problem again. If you really don't want to try it in IE, you can try it with another browser like Firefox.

Ok, just tried it in IE, and it was the same issue. I'm starting to think that it may be a problem with the website... can anyone who isn't using Chrome or IE let me know if they are having problems with that section of the website?

I do not have a problem with the website at all, I have been using it since it came out. It might be best to [submit a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to Riot for them to look into it directly.

Mine is not working either.  I can click on the match in the game client and it pulls up the match history url, but the nothing shows up in the match history window on the site.  This is a new problem though, hasn't happened before today.
For me it started last night. Had no problem viewing it that afternoon, but did that evening.
